messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have sent you a gift, a hospital ship we found out in space and a martial arts expert to help with security

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Just a reminder that anyone who commits a capital crime will be swiftly executed.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of rodents have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The CE has announced their retirement via suicide, give them a farewell in the common radio

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
